c74object.name: tap.shift~
c74object.description: The tap.shift~ object is an efficient pitch-shifter for audio signals. The algorithm is similar to the well known harmv~ pitch shifter from IRCAM's Jimmies.

attribute.name: ratio
attribute.description: Set the ratio of the desired pitch to the original pitch.

attribute.name: windowsize
attribute.description: Set the size of the sound fragments used in the pitch-shifter (in milliseconds).
